thread.title: 'He has a lot of quality' - Alba wants Real Madrid's Isco at Barcelona
thread.title_full: 'He has a lot of quality' - Alba wants Real Madrid's Isco at Barcelona

title: 'He has a lot of quality' - Alba wants Real Madrid's Isco at Barcelona
text:
0 23-Feb-2017 19:31:16 The Real midfielder has been tipped to leave the club in the summer and his former team-mate would be happy for their rivals to secure his services 
Jordi Alba would happily welcome Isco at Barcelona if the midfielder decides to leave Real Madrid at the end of the season. 
RUMOURS: Rooney to quit Man Utd 
The 24-year-old has been struggling to secure regular first-team action at the Santiago Bernabeu, making just 11 starts in La Liga this campaign. 
He recently acknowledged he might have to leave Madrid to get more playing time and Alba has stressed there would always be room for his former Valencia team-mate at Camp Nou. 
"Good players are always welcome," Alba told reporters when asked about a potential move for Isco. "I have a lot of time for Isco. I still know him from when we played together at Valencia and I know he has a lot of quality. 
Barca & Arsenal dominate Champions League Worst Team 
"Time will tell whether anything will happen..." 
Isco has a contract with Madrid until June 2018, meaning the Champions League holders could opt to cash in on the attacking midfielder come the end of the season if he does not agree to an extension, in order to prevent him from leaving on a free next year. Related
